title: Horrible ping & connection
body:
I'm using TPG as my ISP. Can't even play a game with smooth control.
Tracing route to 103.240.227.254 over a maximum of 20 hops

  1   536 ms     3 ms    13 ms  192.168.1.1 
  2   116 ms    21 ms    30 ms  10.20.23.225 
  3   161 ms    40 ms    18 ms  202-7-214-73.tpgi.com.au [202.7.214.73] 
  4     *      107 ms    43 ms  203-221-3-5.tpgi.com.au [203.221.3.5] 
  5    58 ms    55 ms   102 ms  203-219-106-254.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.254] 
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 12     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 13     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 14     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 15     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 17     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 18     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 19     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 20     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

replies.body: happens everywhere. even overseas for me and my friends :/
